meta.name: Custom Chat Buttons
meta.tagline: Modular port of meow and woof from Equicord
meta.description:
By default provides all functionality of [meow](https://github.com/Equicord/Equicord/tree/main/src/equicordplugins/meow) and [woof](https://github.com/Equicord/Equicord/tree/main/src/equicordplugins/woof) from Equicord.

You can add more buttons in the settings! The icons can be a local image file, a URL to an image (must be proxied by Discord), a raw Data URL, or a raw SVG.
meta.changelog: Allow the user to specify icons with raw svg data or data urls

customButtonCount.description: Determines how many custom buttons will be on the chat bar.

sendOnChange.description: If enabled, sends the associated message when you switch to a different button
